job.title: Software Engineer III

job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtPosition SummaryltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtOur teams are building the future that delivers advanced BIGIP application exceed customer expectations This Software Engineer III role is one of the key positions to help ship our next generation BIGIP SoftwareltbrgtltbrgtYou will be part of our global team which focus on DevOps automation tool chain with very clear focus on customer deliveryYour key areas of focus will be end to end automation using CICD pipeline help define release strategy build and maintain test harnesses build reporting workflow for integration and quality efforts etcltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPrimary ResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtUnderstand SDLC Automation tools and framework CICD pipelinesltligtltligtDesign develop and implement software integrations based on requirementsltligtltligtTroubleshoot production issues and coordinate with development team to streamline code deploymentltligtltligtBuild Automation infrastructure in PythonJava for highend network appliances and virtual productsltligtltligtBuild Harnesses for Integration pipelines ampamp Production validation testingltligtltligtServe as source of technical expertise to an agile team and is a mentor for junior staff membersltligtltligtRecommend and maintain technical design methodologies troubleshooting processes and standardsltligtltligtProactively identifying and resolving key technical issuesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtKnowledge Skills And ExperienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtExperience with CICD and project management tools eg Git Jenkins Jira Confluence Bugzilla etcltligtltligtHands on programming skills for developing automation modules using PythonRubyBashJavaJSltligtltligtExperience with configuration management and deployment automation tools such as Terraform Ansible Terraform etcltligtltligtExperience in System Testing and Building Automation ToolsltligtltligtExperience with web technologies REST JSON etcltligtltligtExperience with container technologies eg Kubernetes Docker etcltligtltligtExperience with both private and public cloud infrastructure and interfacing programmatically through APIsltligtltligt5 or more years of related experience with a Bachelors degree or 3 years and a Masters degree or equivalent experienceltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtThe Job Description is intended to be a general representation of the responsibilities and requirements of the job However the description may not be
